categories: Category:Jedi trainees of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Fia was a female Human Jedi Padawan serving the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic during the Cold War with the resurgent Sith Empire.

A Force-sensitive Human, Fia was unaware of her Forcefulness and was working as a crew member on a junk hauler on Raxus Prime when Kel Dor Jedi Master Till'in came across her in his travels. Fearful of the Kel Dor' appearance, Fia fired her blaster at the Jedi, though he deflected the attack with ease. Embarrassed by her attack, Fia accepted the Jedi's offer of training in the ways of the Force at the Tythonian Jedi Temple. Inducted into the Jedi Order as a Padawan apprentice, Fia continued to send letters of apology to Master Till'in, much to his annoyance.
